DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Quality-of-life assessment patient undergoing cancer treatment may help determine intermediate- long-term effect treatment patient cancer . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study quality life patient previously treat ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Quality-of-Life Study Patients With Previously Treated Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Compare quality life term health status , sexual functioning , psychological/emotional well , social functioning ovarian germ cell cancer survivor vs match healthy control group . II . Predict quality life patient additive effect cancer diagnosis treatment , sociodemographic characteristic , stressor , social network variable . OUTLINE : Patients identify 3 healthy acquaintance control within 3 year age . Patients control complete write questionnaire , take 30 minute , telephone interview , take 1 hour , ass quality life . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 190 patient 190 healthy control accrue study within 2 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : History early advance ovarian germ cell tumor Continuously disease free least 2 year prior study Must enrol GOG protocol 45 , 78 , 90 , 116 similar protocol cisplatinbased chemotherapy M.D . Anderson Cancer Center PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : Not specify Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : Not specify Renal : Not specify Other : Must able complete write questionnaire telephone interview English PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : See Disease Characteristics Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : No prior radiotherapy Surgery : Not specify
